title: Reading room, Separate shower with glass enclosure, Package receiving
posting_body: Enjoy the conveniences and flexibility of an active adult lifestyle in Redmond, WA.
Specifically designed for those 55 and better, Reunion at Redmond Ridge is a truly modern living experience with an inspired suite of amenities.
-Separate shower with glass enclosure
-Walking distance to the Eastridge Drive Promenade
-Energy efficient designer lighting
-Resident social lounge and game room                                                                                         Featured amenity
-Across from the Village at Redmond Ridge Shopping Center
-Close proximity to hiking and biking trails
-Townhome-style apartments with attached private garage available
-Subway or mosaic tile kitchen backsplash
-Mountain, lake, and park views                                                                                        Featured amenity

-State of the art fitness center and yoga studio                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity
-Complimentary reserved parking
-Virtual moving concierge – Complimentary address change, set up home services and digital moving announcements
